name: MotivatePT
tag_list: personal-trainer, fitness, workouts, gym, personal-fitness-training, find-a-personal-trainer, gym-health-club, personal-fitness-trainer, personal-training, exercise, health, wellbeing, home-fitness, cardio, find-personal-trainers, personal-trainers
overview:
MotivatePT is a full service mobile fitness provider offering both individual and group personal training across the UK. With headquarters in London, the Company is supported by a national team of over 500 freelance personal trainers, conducting personal training sessions for both private, commercial and corporate clients.

Since its inception, the Company has increased its market presence rapidly, through the delivery of a highly tailored and client-focused service with an emphasis on customer satisfaction. The Company’s strong growth is underpinned by a results-based training system delivered by an established team of personal trainers that hold themselves up to the highest professional standards of education, attainment and personal development.
